contact.headline: Contact Me To Arrange Your First Class
contact.description: Scan the Line QR code or fill out the email form below. I am available between 8 am and 8 pm everyday to respond to your inquiries. I will do my best to reply to you within 2 hours of messaging me.
contact.form_message: Write a short message about what class you want.
